definition: not alone but in pairs (idiom, usually derog.); not a unique occurrence/it's not the only case
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
alone/independent/single/sole/only
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
accidental/image/pair/mate

sentences.english: Industry is not alone in its abuse of animals in product testing.
sentences.chinese: 在測試產品時凌虐動物這一方面，工業是無獨有偶的。

sentences.english: Monolog: Sometimes we are on a collision course and we just don't know it.
sentences.chinese: 事情的發展總是無獨有偶，我們就是不知道。

sentences.english: After the lining which processes once again could be out of the ordinary, unique.
sentences.chinese: 顛末再度處置地面料將會是不同凡響，無獨有偶地。

sentences.english: Wang is very disappointed over the situation, but he is not alone.
sentences.chinese: 王鵬對此感動非常失望，但他的經歷無獨有偶。

sentences.english: Coincidentally, the most of Hindu population in Indonesia are located in Bali.
sentences.chinese: 無獨有偶，印尼的大部分印度教信徒都生活在巴厘島。

sentences.english: This is not theonly case: many countries in Europe began to stop the traffic lights onthe streets.
sentences.chinese: 無獨有偶，歐洲國家也開始計劃逐漸取消街道紅綠燈。

sentences.english: A clump of similar patches exists near the North Pole.
sentences.chinese: 無獨有偶地，這樣的相似區塊也出現在北極附近。

sentences.english: Industry is not alone in its abuse of animals in product testing .
sentences.chinese: 在測試產品時凌虐動物這一方面，工業是無獨有偶的。

observer
